explains: v. 推迟，延缓；把……放在次要地位；把……放在后面

sentences.en: I, for one, would prefer to postpone the meeting.
sentences.cn: 主张推迟会期的，我就是一个。

sentences.en: The only practicable alternative is to postpone the meeting.
sentences.cn: 另外唯一可行的办法就是推迟会期。

sentences.en: It was an unpopular decision to postpone building the new hospital.
sentences.cn: 延迟兴建新医院的决定是不得人心的。
